content.rendered:
Besides the Markthal, Koopgoot, Feyenoord, Hotel New York and the Erasmus Bridge, it is impossible to imagine Rotterdam without the Watertaxi. Together with Watertaxi Rotterdam – owner of the water cabs – we designed the MSTX10 series a few years ago. Extremely fast, safe and economical aluminum boats that can transport 12 people at a time from A to B at a speed of 58 km/h.

This series – extremely suitable for fuel-efficient passenger transport – is standard equipped with, among other things, air pressure-suspended driver’s seat, windscreen wipers, heating, air pressure-controlled doors and roof hatch, and rear doors that close or open the “balcony”. Watertaxi 10 is propelled by 410 HP Cummins diesel (QSL9) engine in combination with a Hamilton 292 HJ Waterjet. In addition to proper propulsion, safety, ease of use and reliability were central to the design of these aluminum boats. Therefore, the water cabs are among other things, 1-handed steerable. Even the windows remain intact during high speeds and point loads. Want to know how? We are happy to tell you!

In addition to proper propulsion, safety, ease of use and reliability were central to the design of these aluminum boats. Therefore, the water cabs are among other things, 1-handed steerable. Even the windows remain intact during high speeds and point loads. Want to know how? We are happy to tell you!
